questionTitle: The boy fell into the river and was ________ along by the fast current.
In a greengrocer's shop there is a lot of ________ when fruit and vegetables are not sold.
If you don't know what the words means, why don't you look it ________ the dictionary?
Do I have to make that French course? No, you ________.
He had no way of making a fire so he had to eat the fish ________.
Her plane takes ________ at 3 p.m.
The child was told to ________ for being rude to his uncle.
I'll have to ________ to you, otherwise he will hear.
"I'll call ________ you at 6 o'clock," said James.
Try to write your figures clearly, the way Anne ________.
The concert was so ________ that the audience went to sleep.
When Mike entered the room, he looked rather pale and in ________ of a shave.
The traffic lights ________ to green, and the cars drove on.
Many people escaped ________ prison camps during the last war.
How long have you been working ________ this exercise?
I hope they will never be able to ________ his offer.
After I had discussed my plans with Professor Watkins I ________ to work on my dissertation.
Absenteeism per employee ________ out at 4 days a year.
The storm played ________ the cross-channel ferry crossings.
If you've got a ________ of cards, I'll show you some tricks.
